publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4 Mike Pringle: Low Limit for Small Claims Courts—That the Parliament notes that the issue of Scotland’s low limit for small claims courts is yet to be resolved and calls on a new Scottish Executive to address this issue as a matter of urgency to allow consumers to get the quick and effective justice they deserve.

S3M-4 Mike Pringle: Low Limit for Small Claims Courts—That the Parliament notes that the issue of Scotland’s low limit for small claims courts is yet to be resolved and calls on a new Scottish Executive to address this issue as a matter of urgency to allow consumers to get the quick and effective justice they deserve.
S3M-4 Low Limit for Small Claims Courts (lodged on 9 May 2007) Jim Tolson*
S3M-4 Low Limit for Small Claims Courts (lodged on 9 May 2007) Ken Macintosh*, Alison McInnes*, Jim Hume*, Mike Rumbles*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-4 Low Limit for Small Claims Courts (lodged on 9 May 2007) Dave Thompson* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S3M-4 Low Limit for Small Claims Courts (lodged on 9 May 2007) Margo MacDonald* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
